Detailed Description

This Particles container class minimises fragmentation in the container, by keeping the particles in a contiguous sequence.

It minimises iteration, insert and remove time but does not guarantee that particles remain in a fixed position in the array. This is an efficient container that works in most cases.

Member Function Documentation

void ContiguousParticles::addParticle ( const Particle &  particle,
bool  isMesh 
) [virtual]

This method adds a newly created particle to the container.

It will not be added if adding the particle pushes the particle population beyond the capacity of the system.

Parameters:
particle The new particle to be added.
isMesh Whether the new particle is mesh-style.
